com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing

Interface IndexInformation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardIndexInformation

    public interface IndexInformation
    An IndexInformation gives basic information on what a particular IndexProvider supports.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean supports(Class<?> dataType)
      Whether the index supports the given data type
      boolean supports(Class<?> dataType, Relation relation)
      Whether the index supports executing queries with the given relation and data type.
